name: Habano Salomon
additionalNotes:
Tony Alvarez Salomon cigar is handmade, aged, and has a smooth medium-bodied taste. Tony's Salomon Habano has a light creamy taste with well-balanced and complex earthy, cocoa & woody notes. It has sweet notes of nuts and finishes with a mild chocolate undertone. The wrapper is an exquisite Cuban-seed Habano sun-grown leaf. The binder and pure long filler are finely cured Cuban-seed habano tobacco. Tony has been making fine cigars since Cuba and these premium Salomon cigars prove his talents. Each Salomon cigar is 7 1/4 inches long with a ring gauge of 58.
https://cccrafter.com/tony-alvarez-habano-salomon-7-x-58-cigars/
